name: Disc Arena
description:
Created for GMTK 2021 "Joined Together" Game Jam.

Face off against a horde of geometric shapes with only your disc and strategic movement to chain together eliminations while staying alive for a new high score.

Designed to be easy to pick up and rewarding to play risky - your disc is as easily used offensively as it is defensively due to the projectile-vaporizing tether it beams to you. Or, take advantage of overwhelming situations with a well timed dash to grab your tossed disc to turn enemy projectiles against themselves.
